meanings.definition: The part of a golf club that strikes the ball.
meanings.sent1: The golfer carefully aligned the clubfaces before teeing off.
meanings.sent2: The clubfaces of his irons were well-worn from frequent use.
meanings.sent3: As the golf ball approached, the mischievous squirrel darted out and kissed one of the clubfaces.
meanings.sent4: Her accuracy on the course was like a sharpshooter aiming through the clubfaces.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming clubfaces reflected the sunlight, dazzling the spectators.

meanings.definition: The front surface of a club head.
meanings.sent1: The clubfaces of the driver were designed for maximum impact.
meanings.sent2: He admired the intricate designs etched onto the clubfaces of the putters.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy left muddy paw prints all over the clubfaces.
meanings.sent4: The clubfaces gleamed like polished mirrors under the bright lights of the golf shop.
meanings.sent5: The golfer's focus was unwavering as he lined up the clubfaces for the perfect shot.

meanings.definition: The position of a club head when addressing the ball.
meanings.sent1: His coach emphasized the importance of the correct clubfaces alignment for a successful swing.
meanings.sent2: The golfer adjusted the clubfaces to ensure they were square to the target.
meanings.sent3: In a playful mood, she pretended to talk to the clubfaces as if they were her loyal pets.
meanings.sent4: The clubfaces stood like sentinels guarding the golfer's every move.
meanings.sent5: The precision of his shot was determined by the angle of the clubfaces at impact.
